title: Juan Carlos Rodríguez (boxer)
text:
Juan Carlos Rodríguez Patiño (born August 14, 1990, in <a href="Cuman%C3%A1">Cumaná</a>, Venezuela) is a Venezuelan amateur <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> in the <a href="Middleweight">Middleweight</a> division. He is considered a top amateur boxer at middleweight in Venezuela.
Amateur career.
In 2011 Rodríguez won a silver medal in first Pan American Games Qualifier at <a href="middleweight">middleweight</a>. He was defeated by the score of 10-4 before the silver medal at the Beijing 2008 Olympic Games by the Cuban Emilio Correa.
